#Text=Get Past the Ending of a Book
#Text=How can you get over the ending of a book ?
#Text=Many people are so obsessed with books that it 's hard not to think of it 's ending and get over it .
#Text=Here 's a few ways that may help you .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Know that the ending chosen is possibly the best ending there is .
#Text=Authors work very hard writing and rewriting the book .
#Text=A good ending could even get them more reads , so there 's a good reason they chose to end it this way .
#Text=It serves the theme of the book .
#Text=Read what the author has to say about it .
#Text=If the book has a sad\unexpected ending , chances are you 're not the only one who ca n't get over it !
#Text=Readers must have been asked why they chose that ending .
#Text=Hearing the author 's point of view can ease you into it .
#Text=Read other comments of other obsessed readers and see what they think .
#Text=You 'll either find people who support your idea , which will make you feel better , or you 'll find people with other opinions .
#Text=Argue with them .
#Text=See who 's right .
#Text=Read other books , either of that same author or someone else .
#Text=Do you like the book ?
#Text=Go ahead and check out more similar books .
#Text=You 're probably only upset because you like the book .
#Text=Go get another one ; you might get over it sooner than you think .
#Text=In fact , as soon as you become obsessed with a new book , you 'll forget about the old one .
#Text=Write your own ending .
#Text=Still think the ending is unfair ?
#Text=than simply make your own ending .
#Text=Rewrite the book your own way in which you find a different route the author never thought of .
#Text=It 'll feel better and you can always think of your version as the original one .
#Text=You can also go and share it on different writing sites that might enjoy your fanfiction ( like Quotev and Wattpad . )
#Text=Maybe you 'll even get published .
#Text=Tips
#Text=Reread the books and think of why the author chose that ending .
#Text=There must be a reason .
#Text=Know that you 're not the only one getting frustrated over books .
#Text=Talk to a friend and get them to read the book also .
#Text=Talk to fellow fans .
#Text=Have a rant about it in your blog , the author 's blog or social networks .
#Text=In the end , it 's only a book , do n't let it control you .
#Text=Go on doing your everyday routines and you 'll forget about it soon .
#Text=Warnings
#Text=Talking to random people about a book 's ending and freaking out may make you look like a crazy person .
#Text=Please fan]boy girl in your own private time .
#Text=There 's no way to get over your obsessions with books in general .
#Text=they can get very additive .
